Class ParticleSource

java.lang.Object
  ObjectInGrid
      ParticleSource

public class ParticleSource
extends ObjectInGrid

The purpose of this class is to act as a template for sourcing particles along in the grid.

Version:
1.0.0.0 June 2, 2014 Last edit: Made the class. Time spent: 5 hours
Author:
Horatiu Lazu

This is the class constructor for the ParticleSource class.

Parameters:
picSource - String This is the picture source for the ParticleSource.
x - int This is the x coordinate of the particle source.
y - int This is the y coordinate of the particle source.
c - Color This is the color for the particle source.
int - numbOfColors This is an integer with the number of colours inside the ParticleSource.
direction - int This is the direction of the ParticleSource.
elementType - String This is the name of the element / type
